pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Implementation of Dynamic TOPMODEL Hydrological Model in R // An R implementation and enhancement of the Dynamic TOPMODEL semi-distributed hydrological model originally proposed by Beven and Freer (2001) doi:10.1002/hyp.252. The 'dynatop' package implements code for simulating models which can be created using the 'dynatopGIS' package.
